ConfigItem.Name: MasterSlave::DynamicField
ConfigItem.Description: Defines dynamic field name for master ticket feature.

ConfigItem.Name: MasterSlave::AdvancedEnabled
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the advanced MasterSlave part of the feature.

ConfigItem.Name: MasterSlave::UnsetMasterSlave
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the feature to unset the MasterSlave state of a ticket in the advanced MasterSlave mode.

ConfigItem.Name: MasterSlave::UpdateMasterSlave
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the feature to change the MasterSlave state of a ticket in the advanced MasterSlave mode.

ConfigItem.Name: MasterSlave::FollowUpdatedMaster
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the feature that slave tickets follow the master ticket to a new master in the advanced MasterSlave mode.

ConfigItem.Name: MasterSlave::ForwardSlaves
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the feature to forward articles from type 'forward' of a master ticket to the customers of the slave tickets. By default (disabled) it will not forward articles from type 'forward' to the slave tickets.

ConfigItem.Name: MasterSlave::KeepParentChildAfterUnset
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the feature to keep parent-child link after unset of the MasterSlave state in the advanced MasterSlave mode.

ConfigItem.Name: MasterSlave::KeepParentChildAfterUpdate
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the feature to keep parent-child link after change of the MasterSlave state in the advanced MasterSlave mode.

ConfigItem.Description: Registration of the ticket event module.

ConfigItem.Description: This module activates Master/Slave field in new email and phone ticket screens.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketMasterSlave
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###480-MasterSlave
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a link in the menu to change the MasterSlave status of a ticket in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Change the MasterSlave state of the ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###RequiredLock
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###TicketType
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket type in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Service
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the service in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Owner
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the ticket owner in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###OwnerMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if ticket owner must be selected by the agent.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Responsible
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the responsible agent of the ticket in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###State
ConfigItem.Description: If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of the ticket in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###StateType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###StateDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Note
ConfigItem.Description: Allows adding notes in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###NoteMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if note must be filled in by the agent. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Subject
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default subject for notes added in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Body
ConfigItem.Description: Sets the default body text for notes added in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###InvolvedAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a list of all the involved agents on this ticket, in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###InformAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Shows a list of all the possible agents (all agents with note permissions on the queue/ticket) to determine who should be informed about this note, in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###ArticleTypeDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default type of the note in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###ArticleTypes
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies the different note types that will be used in the system.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Priority
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the ticket priority options in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###PriorityDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the default ticket priority in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Title
ConfigItem.Description: Shows the title fields in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###HistoryType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history type for the ticket MasterSlave screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###HistoryComment
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the history comment for the ticket MasterSlave screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0900-TicketMaster
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the master tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0910-TicketSlave
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the slave tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: ReplaceCustomerRealNameOnSlaveArticleTypes
ConfigItem.Description: Specifies the different article types where the real name from Master ticket will be replaced with the one in the Slave ticket.
